Row.Text: The Altar receives a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Mountains and Natural Wonders.
+10% Growth Rate in Settlements with an Altar.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture on Quarters in Settlements with an Altar.
+5 healing for Units in Rural tiles with an Altar in the Capital.
+1[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food on Farms, Pastures, and Plantations in Settlements with an Altar. Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold on Camps and Woodcutters in Settlements with an Altar. Warehouse bonus.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Buildings in Cities with an Altar.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Fishing Boats in Settlements with an Altar. Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_CULTURE] Culture,[icon:YIELD_FOOD] Food,[icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold,[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness,[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production, and[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on the Altar.
+15%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Military Units in Cities with an Altar.
+1[icon:YIELD_SCIENCE] Science on Quarters in Settlements with an Altar.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards constructing Wonders in Cities with an Altar.
+10%[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production towards training Settlers in Cities with an Altar.
The Altar receives a +1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness Adjacency for Coast, Lakes, and Navigable River tiles.
+1[icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on Clay Pits, Mines, and Quarries in Settlements with an Altar. Warehouse bonus.
+1[icon:YIELD_HAPPINESS] Happiness on Resources in Settlements with an Altar. This Pantheon can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.
+25%[icon:YIELD_DIPLOMACY] Influence towards Endeavors and Sanctions with an Altar in the Capital. This Pantheon can be chosen by multiple Civilizations.
